## Readme

The run_analysis.R provides the code that was used to build the intermediate and final tidy dataset required by the assignment.  

The codebook.Rmd is the codebook that explains the small scripts that build towards the final today dataset.  

The step5_tidydata.txt is the output of the tidy dataset requested in the assignment.
